song.englishname: I Want To Believe In Something

english.segment1: Well I'm living with these old lies. And I'm stuck back here in yesterday. Keep your head up it'll get better. That's all I hear but I'm still drifting away
english.segment2: I set my sail for winds of fortune. Well I'm sorry but there's no wind today. And my bodies feeling tired. I guess I'll kill myself and ease the pain
english.segment3: Chorus: I cannot take another moment. Do I just lay back be crucified?. I wanna believe in something. Man I feel like I'm just wasting away. I gotta believe in something. Oh... before I'm dead
english.segment4: Man I've traveled every highway. And I just can't seem to find the one that's right. And I've burned that bridge behind me. I want my sanity, I just want my peace of mind. . Chorus.
